name: Csharp(C#) Main Topics
tagline: (This page is under construction) Welcome to this C# Main Topics Document. Here you will find C# (pronounced C Sharp) key topics summaries and links for better knowledge
body:
# Generics
Generics provide type safety without the overhead of multiple implementations, but there are few thinks to keep in mind while using them.

Scenario
```csharp
public class Generic<T>
{
    public T Field; 
    public T AddSub()
    {
        T i = Field + 1;
    }
}
```
Why does this code not compile?
The answer is the  + operator is not defined for T.
For further information, please visit: [Generics](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/c6cyy67b%28v=vs.90%29.aspx)
